results.title: I'm not French
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Alain Herz and ACMI
results.brief_description: Alain Herz examines his ethnicity, tracing it back to his parents Jewish/Polish background, his upbringing in Belgium and his eventual migration from France to Australia. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Alain Herz and ACMI

results.title: Second life
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Ximena Silberman and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ximena migrated to Australia in 2003. To migrate is to be born again. While enjoying her new life in Australia, she looks back at the friendships and life she left behind in Buenos Aires. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Ximena Silberman and ACMI
results.description: Ximena migrated to Australia in 2003. To migrate is to be born again. results.title: The Shoemaker
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Adam Nudelman and ACMI
results.brief_description: Artist Adam Nudelman asks himself why he always paints shoes? Behind these objects lies a story about family and loss and brings him closer to his Jewish heritage. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Adam Nudelman and ACMI

results.title: My beautiful shwesters
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Adam Barolsky and ACMI
results.brief_description: Adam Barolsky laments the distance he has put between himself and his sisters to find a better life. He tells a tale of deep sorrow and concern for the welfare of the family he has left behind. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Adam Barolsky and ACMI
results.description: Adam Barolsky laments the distance he has put between himself and his sisters to find a better life. results.title: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Ifran Hassan and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ifran Hassan recalls leaving his homeland of Cyprus in 1970 to escape the troubled political climate, his destination, Melbourne where he set out to make a new life for himself and to help improve the lives of others.

results.title: Without a doubt
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Lyn Skillern and ACMI
results.brief_description: John Rouse, a kind and fun loving man from Yorkshire loved to dress as Santa and even had his own catch phrase, ‘without a doubt’. His daughter-in-law Lyn Skillern and her family remember and pay tribute to him.

results.brief_description: A chance decision led Graham Goulding into a teaching job in China where the banquets were endless and he and his colleagues were treated like royalty. A unique adventure that has remained with Goulding long after his return to Gippsland.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Graham Goulding and ACMI
results.description: A chance decision led Graham Goulding into a teaching job in China where the banquets were endless and he and his colleagues were treated like royalty. A unique adventure that has remained with Goulding long after his return to Gippsland.

results.title: In a galaxy far far away  - me and my game
results.brief_description: Born and raised in Mildura, 15 year old Justyn Smith loves to play video games. It keeps him out of trouble and besides roaming around the streets of Mildura is boring anyway! This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.
